Privacy Policy

This privacy policy covers SYSTEMS LIMITED handling of information, data and any assets collected by SYSTEMS LIMITED or provided to SYSTEMS LIMITED on sole discretion of its clients.

This privacy policy does not apply to the practices of companies and third parties that SYSTEMS LIMITED does not own or control, or of persons that SYSTEMS LIMITED does not employ or manage, including any third-party content contributors bound by contract.

Information where used means any information voluntarily provided by our clients through any means for carrying out the work as per business contract. SYSTEMS LIMITED may at any time, without prior notice and in its sole discretion, amend this policy. Please keep the latest version of this policy for your reference at all times.

This privacy policy aims to comply with the privacy laws applicable to the personal data we collect and use as part of engagements with our customer and clients.

This privacy policy aims to comply with the privacy laws applicable to the personal data we collect and use as part of engagements with our customer and clients.

Information Collection and Use

SYSTEMS LIMITED values the privacy of its customers and clients. The policy of SYSTEMS LIMITED and its worldwide offices, hereinafter called SYSTEMS LIMITED regarding collection, storage and processing of information is elaborated in this policy. SYSTEMS LIMITED reserves the right to occasionally change the policy at its own discretion.

Information Collection

All customer/client information collected shall be used for the purpose it was meant to server as per agreement. Customer information which includes but not limited to NPI, PII etc. shall be safeguarded using adequate controls and security measures (such as, username and password), shared between SYSTEMS LIMITED and its client.

SYSTEMS LIMITED collects information such as name, email, and shipping address and financial information such as credit card number, expiration date etc. over the web using order form from clients/customers ordering our products, for billing purposes and to fill customer orders. If we have trouble processing an order, the information is used to contact the clients/customers.

Information Collection

SYSTEMS LIMITED shall use information collected as part of engagement;

  • To provide clients/customers with information about product upgrades, new products, services, newsletters, informative emails, and research on future product ideas or improvements;
  • To assist SYSTEMS LIMITED in creating content that is relevant to clients/customers;
  • To assist SYSTEMS LIMITED in creating better products and services to meet clients/customers needs;
  • To allow clients/customers to purchase, download, and manage product licenses, obtain access to services or otherwise engage in activities selected by clients/customers;
  • To help SYSTEMS LIMITED share software, services or product information important to its clients/customers
  • Cookies A cookie is a piece of data stored on the users computer tied to information about the user. Usage of a cookie is in no way linked to any personally identifiable information while on our site. We use session ID cookies. For the session ID cookie, once users close the browser, the cookie simply terminates.
  • Cookies are used to maintain the identity of users with our site after users log in with a username and password. This allows the users to identify themselves (log in) once rather than multiple times per web session. You can choose to disable cookies by following the procedure suggested by your particular browser. If you choose to disable cookies in your browser, you may still be able to access our site depending on where you are in our site.

This information shall be compiled and analyzed to enhance our products and services and shall not be used in any way used to identify our clients/customers personally.

Except as specifically described in this privacy policy, we will not, without clients/customers prior consent, sell any information such as Non Public Information, Personally Identifiable Information to any third parties other than authorized third parties and others involved in the e-commerce distribution chain (e.g., vendors, suppliers), which may need access to some of your personal information. For example, if we ship an order to you, we must share your name and address with a shipping company. We do not give access to data on individual transactions to third parties, other than as described in this privacy policy.

Communications of Information

We at SYSTEMS LIMITED shall ensure to preserve user privacy, however there are certain circumstances where SYSTEMS LIMITED may need to disclose personal information when required by law wherein we have a good-faith belief that such action is necessary to comply with a current judicial proceeding, a court order or legal process served on our products, services or website.

SYSTEMS LIMITED uses links to other sites in its websites offered as part of services to different clients. Please be aware that SYSTEMS LIMITED shall not be responsible for the privacy practices of such other sites. We encourage clients/customers to be aware once redirected to external sites either voluntarily or involuntarily, read the privacy statements of each and every Web site that collects personally identifiable information. This privacy statement applies solely to information collected by SYSTEMS LIMITED as part of its engagement of product or service or website with its customers and clients.

In-case a customer or clients personally identifiable information changes (such as zip code, phone, email or postal address), or if a client no longer continues to use service, SYSTEMS LIMITED shall correct, update or delete users personally identifiable information.

Quick Links

  • About us
  • Services
  • News/Blogs

Get Social with us

Contact Info
